Description: This response is for general information only and does not replace individual legal counsel for specific cases.
For legal actions based on specific facts, always consult a legal professional (e.g., an attorney).
Note that legal judgments can vary significantly based on minor differences in factual circumstances.
All legal rights have set exercise periods; please verify the relevant statute of limitations.
Legal interpretations and Supreme Court precedents can change without notice; check for the latest info.
We aim to improve information accessibility by lowering the barrier of difficult legal terminology.
Legal Q&A is used only for statistics and service improvement; real names are not stored.
Information is based on the National Law Information Center and court precedent guides.
